description:
Devoted to increasing your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve following an accident or another preventable tragedy caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, the attorneys at Cellino Law in Garden City, New York, are here to help you with your serious personal injury or wrongful death claim arising from any of the following:
• Car, truck, motorcycle and other types of motor vehicle accidents
• Slip-and-fall accidents, negligent security and other premises liability claims
• Construction and work-related accidents
• Medical malpractice and dangerous drugs
• Defective products
• Other preventable tragedies

Regarded nationally as among the top lawyers in the country, our team of experienced, dedicated legal professionals possesses the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and to improve the likelihood you will recover the full amount of compensation you need. To date, we have recovered more than $2 billion in settlements for our plaintiff clients, and you can rely on us to fight hard to increase your chances for achieving the favorable outcomes you seek.

In honor of our impeccable professionalism, high ethical standards and outstanding legal abilities, our attorneys have earned consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America along with AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. We are also members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

To begin the process of securing a brighter and more financially stable future for yourself and your loved ones, you can contact Cellino Law by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We have five total offices throughout New York, and we offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
